Name: The Guild Garage
Title: Speed and the Demon
Desc: A '16 Bugatti Chiron and a Dodge Demon; a '60s Westfalia Volkswagen Van and a 1983 Mercedes G Wagon.
LongDescription: David visits his friend Tim "The Hapi Hipi" again to check out his latest purchases: a '16 4-turbo, 1500 horsepower Bugatti Chiron and a Dodge Demon; Bart works on a '60s Westfalia Volkswagen Van and a 1983 Mercedes G Wagon.
